name: Cool & Smart Feedly
description:
This feedly CSS script gives you many advantages when you read in Feedly. Also its a combination of smart and dark color.Couple of things why you use this script.

Here are those-
*New background added
*Eye comfortable color added
*Fix some other tweaks
*Changed Floating bar
*Add many feature in title only view
*Comfortable font size
*And many more

----------------------------------------------------------
Note:Set feedly theme to Classic Gray for having best view
----------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------
Screen-shot link:http://i.imgur.com/tLSMGmH.jpg
----------------------------------------------------------
Have Fun.
